conbody.p: If the main burner ignites momentarily but does not sustain ignition, allow the water heater to try to ignite up to two more times until the control system locks out and the Ignition Failure fault message displays on the control system screen. If the water heater is experiencing rough starts, see .
For momentary ignition problems without rough starting, check the following:

ul.li: Undersized supply-gas line (low volume of supply gas). See .
A supply-gas regulator is not installed per installation requirements (erratic gas-supply volume/pressures). See .
See the list of possible causes and things to check and repair for the Ignition Failure fault message in .
Debris clogging/blocking the intake-air screen(s). See and .
Debris clogging/blocking the Main Burner. See .
